content: Hello! This is the AI receptionist from XYZ Home Services. I understand you might need electrical work done. May I know your name to start scheduling an appointment?
Thanks, Mary! Can you please provide your address so I can check if you're in our service area?
Great, Mary. You are within our service area. What would be an ideal time for our team to visit you?
I'm not sure about scheduling yet. I'm waiting for my insurance to decide if they will cover the repairs.
I understand, Mary. If you'd like, I can note that and check back with you later to schedule once you have the insurance confirmation. Would that work for you?
Yes, that sounds good. For now, I wonâ€™t schedule anything until the insurance clears it.
reason: Customer waiting for insurance coverage before scheduling
